ref: 8533 praṇītā f. ʻ sacrificial vessel ʼ lex. [Cf. práṇītāḥ f. pl. ʻ holy water ʼ ŚBr., praṇītapraṇáyana -- n. ʻ vessel in which holy water is fetched ʼ ŚBr. -- práṇīta -- ]
Ku. paṇyũ ʻ a spoon to stir rice -- water with ʼ;
N. paniũ, pun˚ ʻ ladle to stir rice with ʼ;
G. paḷī f. ʻ ladle, dipper ʼ, paḷɔ m. ʻ large ladle ʼ: semant., but not phonet., rather < *pāṇikā -- .
